survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Electric Vehicle Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, behaviors, and barriers related to electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to help improve infrastructure and services.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of response. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging station do you most frequently use?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an option for users who may not know the technical differences between charging levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Apply skip logic based on Q1 responses.

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for faster or more convenient charging options?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge willingness to pay. Include a neutral option ('Depends').

script.question_text: Would you be willing to pay more for faster or more convenient charging options?
